comments:
Details:
An exception pop up when modify the parameter name in Editor dataset

Step:
1.New a sample data source
2.New a data set from CUSTOMS and Query is: 
select *
from CLASSICMODELS.CUSTOMERS
where CLASSICMODELS.CUSTOMERS.CUSTOMERNUMBER < ?
3.Switch Parameter in Editor Data Set.
4.Set the parameter value as 130.
5.Add a data item and binding the dataset.
6.Double click the dataset to edit the data set
7.Switch to Parameter.
8.Modify the name of parameter

Actual result:
Pop up an exception
